meaningMnemonic: Under a misshapen crescent <radical>moon</radical>, a <radical>dog</radical> <radical>boil</radical>s as much <kanji>nature</kanji> as it can find.
readingMnemonic: Destroying <kanji>nature</kanji> like this is the dog's way of practicing <reading>Zen</reading> (ぜん) Buddhism. As it breathes in the fumes from all of the different pieces of nature being boiled down, the dog gets really zen and chill.
